original_title: Imagine none of this is real
overview: A strange, melancholy travelogue through the post-human world. A record of the land and the resonance of itâ€™s history. The images and the medium exist in a tense balance, where each amplifies and distorts the other. This work is not only about the landscapes being captured, but the media being used to capture it.
title: Imagine none of this is real
